snippet.title: Dolan Kart Update - NIXXIOMVILLE (now live!)
snippet.description:
New character, heaps of new skins, a new powerup, new level, daily missions and offline mode! Download (Android/IOS) and start racing today for FREE!
Android ► https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chunkworks.dolankart&hl=en
Apple ► https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/dolan-kart/id1316860571

IMPORTANT NOTE ► Due to an Apple store bug, existing IOS players may have their account desynced upon updating. Please email support@chunk.works if this happens to you and your account will be resynced.

Join the DK discord community! ► https://discord.gg/PgVpHmz
Please remember to report bugs and issues by emailing support@chunk.works - we're happy to help!

NEW CONTENT OVERVIEW
---
New character: Nixxiom
New level: Nixxiomville
New ability: Freeze
- Turn enemies solid, bash into them for speed boosts. Each subsequent enemy hit speeds you up more and more, fully upgraded makes for the fastest ability in-game, best way to get exp!
- Reworked Waterfall
- New obstacles
- Offline mode
- Daily missions
- Completely new interface, new leaderboard system for daily, weekly, monthly & all-time stats with various rewards for brackets
